sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the current text of a text field specified by widgetID. The widgetID must specify a text field widget.
sections.mdown_content: Returns the current text of a text field specified by *widgetID*. The *widgetID *must specify a text field widget.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetText, not by calling GetText.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.GetText**, not by calling **GetText**.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: GUI.SetText for setting the text in a text field. See also GUI.CreateTextField.
sections.mdown_content: **[gui_settext.html](GUI.SetText) **for setting the text in a text field. See also **GUI.CreateTextField**.
